The hotel is undergoing some significant renovations which may if you are unlucky interfere with your daytime use of your room
The main reason I booked this hotel was to see and enjoy the indoor pool but little did I know they started renovating the pool just a few days before I checked in
There is a large and well appointed gym which is open 247 but unfortunately the pool was being renovated and was not available
The hotel needs a bit of an update in public areas but it is clean comfortable and the room large and well appointed
Interior the interior is old and definitely needs a renovation bedding is questionable when seeing under the sheets you will find old stained bedding
The hotel rooms are in need of updating and despite we had asked for our bedding to be changed there was still stains on the pillow cases
The pillows and the room really was a bit old world tired and in need of a renovation
Tried to visit restaurant but closed for refurbishment
